16  package org.apache.ibatis.cache.decorators;
17  
18  import java.lang.ref.ReferenceQueue;
19  import java.lang.ref.SoftReference;
20  import java.util.LinkedList;
21  import java.util.concurrent.locks.ReadWriteLock;
22  
23  import org.apache.ibatis.cache.Cache;
24  
25  /**
26   * Soft Reference cache decorator
27   * Thanks to Dr. Heinz Kabutz for his guidance here.
28   */
29  public class SoftCache implements Cache {
30    private final LinkedList<Object> hardLinksToAvoidGarbageCollection;
31    private final ReferenceQueue<Object> queueOfGarbageCollectedEntries;
32    private final Cache delegate;
33    private int numberOfHardLinks;
34  
35    public SoftCache(Cache delegate) {
36      this.delegate = delegate;
37      this.numberOfHardLinks = 256;
38      this.hardLinksToAvoidGarbageCollection = new LinkedList<Object>();
39      this.queueOfGarbageCollectedEntries = new ReferenceQueue<Object>();
40    }
41  
42    public String getId() {
43      return delegate.getId();
44    }
45  
46    public int getSize() {
47      removeGarbageCollectedItems();
48      return delegate.getSize();
49    }
50  
51    public void setSize(int size) {
52      this.numberOfHardLinks = size;
53    }
54  
55    public void putObject(Object key, Object value) {
56      removeGarbageCollectedItems();
57      delegate.putObject(key, new SoftEntry(key, value, queueOfGarbageCollectedEntries));
58    }
59  
60    public Object getObject(Object key) {
61      Object result = null;
62      @SuppressWarnings("unchecked") // assumed delegate cache is totally managed by this cache
63      SoftReference<Object> softReference = (SoftReference<Object>) delegate.getObject(key);
64      if (softReference != null) {
65        result = softReference.get();
66        if (result == null) {
67          delegate.removeObject(key);
68        } else {
69          // See #586 (and #335) modifications need more than a read lock 
70          synchronized (hardLinksToAvoidGarbageCollection) {
71            hardLinksToAvoidGarbageCollection.addFirst(result);
72            if (hardLinksToAvoidGarbageCollection.size() > numberOfHardLinks) {
73              hardLinksToAvoidGarbageCollection.removeLast();
74            }
75          }
76        }
77      }
78      return result;
79    }
80  
81    public Object removeObject(Object key) {
82      removeGarbageCollectedItems();
83      return delegate.removeObject(key);
84    }
85  
86    public void clear() {
87      synchronized (hardLinksToAvoidGarbageCollection) {
88        hardLinksToAvoidGarbageCollection.clear();
89      }
90      removeGarbageCollectedItems();
91      delegate.clear();
92    }
93  
94    public ReadWriteLock getReadWriteLock() {
95      return delegate.getReadWriteLock();
96    }
97  
98    private void removeGarbageCollectedItems() {
99      SoftEntry sv;
100     while ((sv = (SoftEntry) queueOfGarbageCollectedEntries.poll()) != null) {
101       delegate.removeObject(sv.key);
102     }
103   }
104 
105   private static class SoftEntry extends SoftReference<Object> {
106     private final Object key;
107 
108     private SoftEntry(Object key, Object value, ReferenceQueue<Object> garbageCollectionQueue) {
109       super(value, garbageCollectionQueue);
110       this.key = key;
111     }
112   }
113 
114 }
